title: Night Train to Lisbon 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC BRENYS
description:
One rainy afternoon , a woman dressed in a red coat try to shoot the Kirchenfeld bridge in Bern, Switzerland. Raimund Gregorius , a professor of Latin, Greek and Hebrew , convinces her not to. Suddenly , the woman disappears, leaving his coat behind. In the pocket of her blouse forgotten , he finds a book by a Portuguese author, Amadeu Prado , and a train ticket to Lisbon dated that same day. And it is then that one accustomed to an orderly and uneventful life , teacher takes an unusual decision : He decides to embark on an exciting adventure that will take you to a journey into your own heart .
